Hotel Booking - React Native
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cheaphotel.armanhotel
Developed the search engine of finding cheap hotels around the world
Get the best Hotel Deals & Offers
Developed the engine discovering last minute hotels deals to save money
Implemented the currency exchange from all around the world.
Provided multiple filter options.
Store the the guest reviews, ratings & experiences
Developed Friendly & easy-to-use interface

Technologies: React, Redux, React Native, NativeBase, Realm, AsyncStorage, React Native Elements,
